body: NOTE: This will be less of an issue if we use multiple workers, as there will always be at least one worker running.

After #1331:
> 2020-03-17T20:26:45.136307+00:00 app[worker.1]: 2020-03-17 20:26:45,136:INFO:bugbug_http.boot:Cloning autoland in /tmp/bugbug-hg...
> 2020-03-17T20:39:08.005420+00:00 app[worker.1]: 2020-03-17 20:39:08,005:INFO:bugbug.db:Downloading https://community-tc.services.mozilla.com/api/index/v1/task/project.relman.bugbug.data_test_label_scheduling_history.latest/artifacts/public/past_failures_label.lmdb.tar.zst to data/past_failures_label.lmdb.tar.zst
> 2020-03-17T20:43:43.749004+00:00 app[worker.1]: 2020-03-17 20:43:43,748:INFO:bugbug.db:Downloading https://community-tc.services.mozilla.com/api/index/v1/task/project.relman.bugbug.data_test_group_scheduling_history.latest/artifacts/public/past_failures_group.lmdb.tar.zst to data/past_failures_group.lmdb.tar.zst
> 2020-03-17T20:47:29.947497+00:00 app[worker.1]: 2020-03-17 20:47:29,947:INFO:bugbug_http.boot:Worker boot done

It didn't save much, going from a total of 22 minutes to a total of 21 minutes! We could probably even revert it for simplicity sake.

issue.title: Clone mozilla-central directly in the HTTP service worker Docker image

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body:
See also #1344.

Would help a lot for #1407.

An image with the DBs downloaded (but not extracted) and a Mercurial clone is 10 GB, so it would be pretty big...

body:
After #1344, and especially with a2553bf9876f66ecb35d07699eec3f76de1b96a4 wich decreased the size of some files from GBs to MBs, we are down to 13 minutes and 30 seconds. 10 minutes and 30 seconds to clone autoland, 3 minutes to update the commits DB:

issue.title: Don't update working copy of the repository

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body:
Will help with #1407.

Depends on #1433 and #1481.

body:
After #1469, 7 minutes and 10 seconds to clone autoland, 30 seconds to clean/pull (which we could avoid since we just cloned!), 6 minutes to update the commits DB (double because we had twice the number of commits this time):

issue.title: Don't update repo after we clone it

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body:
If we just cloned a repository, there is no need to update it.

This should help with #1407.

issue.title: Don't clean the repo after we clone it

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body:
There's no chance it is "unclean", so there is no need to run `hg revert` and `hg strip` when we clone.

This should help with #1407.

issue.title: Avoid pulling after cloning

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

issue.body:
We're pulling to generate the pushlog, is it not generated by cloning already?

If we are able to avoid pulling after cloning, we can improve #1407.
